newsitem.title: USA: ASV Inc order backlog surges.
newsitem.headline: ASV Inc order backlog surges.

text.p: ASV Inc on Monday confirmed orders of $7 million for its Posi-Track all-season vehicles as of March 21, about $6 million above year-ago figures.
In addition, to the Posi-Track, ASV's newest product, the HD 125 track utility vehicle, which was introduced February 28th, has already generated orders of about $500,000, the company said.
ASV recently began a second shift in certain areas of its manufacturing plant and is expanding its plant to 100,000 square feet from 40,000, the company said.
ASV hopes the expansion will be operating July 1, company president Gary Lemke said.
ASV shares were up 1/4 at 19 Monday.
